attributes.action: Take action to release British citizen Maryam Kallis held in detention in Syria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mrs Kallis has been detained since the middle of March in Syria without charge or trial. A British citizen and mother of four, she has been denied access to her family who are distraught without her.

The Foreign & Commonwealth Office must take all steps to ensure that either Mrs Kallis is tried for a crime or is released immediately and brought back to the UK.

rejection.details: Please contact the Foreign & Commonwealth Office in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
